channel.title: dyneval :: Evaluating methods on dynverse
channel.description: Recent content in dyneval :: Evaluating methods on dynverse

item.title: Running an evaluation of a method on a set of datasets with a set of parameters
item.description: evaluate_ti_method.Rd Running an evaluation of a method on a set of datasets with a set of parameters evaluate_ti_method(dataset, method, parameters, metrics, give_priors = NULL, output_model = TRUE, seed = function() random_seed(), map_fun = map, verbose = FALSE) Arguments dataset The first trajectory, in most cases a gold standard trajectory method One or more methods. Must be one of: an object or list of ti_.
